channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How rare earths can serve as a key weapon in China’s trade war with the U.S.

item.title: Looking for work? These states might have the best job opportunities.

item.title: ‘We have been married for 10 years’: My children will get my estate — not my husband, who has $1.3 million. Is that fair?
item.description: “He plans to leave me a life estate in the condo and the ability to receive rent from his properties.”

item.title: ‘It’s getting scary close to retirement’: We’re 70. We have no debt, no stocks and $275K in savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “We will have $4,300 a month in Social Security.”

item.title: I’m 77. Despite my $1.4 million wealth, my expenses exceed my income. Do I sell stocks to pay off my mortgage?
item.description: “I started my own tax-preparation and representation firm. My annual revenue is $60,000 before taxes.”

item.title: HSBC upgrades shares of Freeport-McMoRan on higher copper prices
item.description: HSBC sees shares of Freeport-McMoRan rising 20% from here.

item.title: Oppenheimer upgrades Jefferies amid credit concern selloff, says First Brands exposure 'very limited'
item.description: Shares of Jefferies have plunged about 26% since First Brands filed for bankruptcy on Sept. 29.

item.title: Bank of America raises target for AMD, sees nearly 30% rally on new AI hardware platform launch
item.description: Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya's new price objective of $300 implies that shares of Advanced Micro Devices could rally 28% from here.
